services.title: Done-For-You Systems
services.shortDescription: I build it. You use it. Full operations setup‚ÄîClickUp, automations, client workflows‚Äîdelivered turnkey.
services.fullDescription: Complete operations infrastructure built for you. ClickUp setup, automated workflows, commission tracking‚Äîdelivered turnkey in 4-6 weeks.
services.bestFor: Advisors booking $500K+ who need to stop doing everything manually.
included: Full discovery of your current workflows and pain points
Custom ClickUp workspace setup (or optimization of existing)
Automated workflows for booking, client communication, and tracking

process.title: Discovery
process.description: We audit your current systems, identify bottlenecks, and map your ideal workflows. You'll fill out a detailed questionnaire and we'll have a 90-minute discovery call.

process.title: Build
process.description: I build your custom system‚ÄîClickUp workspace, automations, templates, dashboards. You'll see progress updates and have opportunities for feedback.

process.title: Training
process.description: Live training sessions for you and your team. Recorded for future reference. We walk through every workflow until you're confident.

process.title: Launch + Support
process.description: Go live with your new system. I'm available for questions, adjustments, and troubleshooting for 30 days post-launch.

pricingTiers.tier: Small team (2-5 people) with multiple workflows

faqs.question: How long does the full build take?
faqs.answer: Typically 4-6 weeks from kickoff to launch. Complex projects may take 8 weeks.

faqs.question: Do I need to use ClickUp?
faqs.answer: ClickUp is my primary recommendation for travel operations, but I can work with other tools if you have strong preferences or existing investments.

faqs.question: What if I already have some systems in place?
faqs.answer: Great‚Äîwe'll audit what's working and build from there. No need to start completely from scratch.

faqs.question: Can you work with my existing team?
faqs.answer: Yes. Training is included for up to 5 team members. Additional team members can be added for a fee.

faqs.question: What happens after the 30-day support period?
faqs.answer: You'll have full documentation and training recordings. If you want ongoing support, I offer monthly retainer packages.

faqs.question: Do you guarantee results?
faqs.answer: I guarantee you'll have a functioning, documented system that does what we agreed it would do. Specific business results depend on your implementation and consistency.

services.title: VIP Strategy Day
services.shortDescription: One day. Complete clarity. We map your workflows, identify the bottlenecks, and build your 90-day action plan.
services.fullDescription: One intensive day to get complete clarity on your operations. Workflow mapping, bottleneck identification, and a 90-day action plan‚Äîdelivered in a single focused session.
services.bestFor: Advisors ready to level up but not sure where to start.
included: Pre-day questionnaire and audit of your current systems
Workflow mapping for your top 3 processes
90-day action plan with prioritized next steps
14 days of follow-up support via email

process.description: You'll complete a detailed questionnaire about your current systems, pain points, and goals. I'll review your responses and do preliminary research before we meet.
We spend 4 focused hours (with breaks) mapping your workflows, identifying bottlenecks, and designing solutions. This is collaborative‚Äîyou know your business, I know systems.
Within 48 hours, you receive your 90-day action plan document, annotated workflow maps, and the session recording. You have 14 days of email support for follow-up questions.

faqs.question: Is this virtual or in-person?
faqs.answer: Virtual via Zoom. This allows us to share screens, record everything, and work efficiently.

faqs.question: What if I need more than 4 hours?
faqs.answer: Most clients find 4 hours is enough for significant clarity. If we need more time, we can schedule a follow-up session at a reduced rate.

faqs.question: What if I want you to implement the plan afterward?
faqs.answer: Many VIP Day clients move to Done-For-You Systems after. Your VIP Day investment can be credited toward a larger engagement within 60 days.

faqs.question: Can my team join?
faqs.answer: Yes‚Äîup to 2 additional team members can join at no extra cost. This is especially useful if they'll be implementing the changes.

faqs.question: What do I need to prepare?
faqs.answer: Complete the pre-day questionnaire honestly and thoroughly. Have access to your current tools (ClickUp, email, etc.) ready to share your screen.

services.title: Workflow Audit
services.shortDescription: Expert eyes on your setup before you invest in bigger changes. Written report with specific recommendations.
services.fullDescription: A focused review of your current systems with specific recommendations. Written audit report, priority action list, and a 30-minute walkthrough call.
services.bestFor: Those who want expert feedback before committing to a larger investment.
included: Review of your current tools and workflows
Written audit report with specific recommendations
Priority action list (what to fix first)

process.description: You complete a detailed questionnaire and share access to your current tools
I review everything and prepare your audit report (3-5 business days)
We have a 30-minute call to discuss findings and answer questions
You receive the final written report with prioritized recommendations

faqs.question: What do you actually review?
faqs.answer: Your project management setup (ClickUp, Trello, etc.), client communication workflows, booking/tracking processes, and any automations you have in place.

faqs.question: What if you find nothing wrong?
faqs.answer: Then you'll have peace of mind and validation that your systems are solid. But honestly, I've never audited a system and found nothing to improve.

faqs.question: Can this lead to a larger engagement?
faqs.answer: Yes‚Äîyour audit investment can be credited toward VIP Strategy Day or Done-For-You Systems within 30 days.

faqs.question: How detailed is the report?
faqs.answer: Typically 5-10 pages with specific observations, recommendations, and a prioritized action list. No fluff.
